summary.span: 侦听文件系统更改通知，并在目录或目录中的文件发生更改时引发事件。

span.span: Listens to the file system change notifications and raises events when a directory, or file in a directory, changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要监视的指定目录中的更改。Use to watch for changes in a specified directory. 你可以监视文件和子目录的指定目录中的更改。You can watch for changes in files and subdirectories of the specified directory. 你可以创建一个组件来监视本地计算机、 网络驱动器或远程计算机上的文件。You can create a component to watch files on a local computer, a network drive, or a remote computer. 若要监视的所有文件中的更改，请设置属性为空字符串 ("") 或使用通配符 ("*。\*")。To watch for changes in all files, set the property to an empty string ("") or use wildcards ("*.\*"). 若要监视的特定文件，到的文件名称的属性。To watch a specific file, set the property to the file name. 例如，若要监视的文件 MyDoc.txt 中的更改，请设置"MyDoc.txt"的属性。For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the property to "MyDoc.txt". 你也可以观看某种类型的文件中的更改。You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file. 例如，若要监视的文本文件中的更改，请设置属性设置为"\*.txt"。For example, to watch for changes in text files, set the property to "\*.txt". 有几种类型的可监视的目录或文件中的更改。There are several types of changes you can watch for in a directory or file. 例如，你可以监视中的更改`Attributes`、`LastWrite`日期和时间，或`Size`的文件或目录。For example, you can watch for changes in `Attributes`, the `LastWrite` date and time, or the `Size` of files or directories. 这可通过设置属性之一值。This is done by setting the property to one of the values. 你可以观看上的更改类型的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the type of changes you can watch, see . 你可以监视重命名，删除或创建文件或目录。You can watch for renaming, deletion, or creation of files or directories. 例如，若要监视的文本文件的重命名，请设置属性设置为"\*.txt"并调用方法替换指定为其参数。For example, to watch for renaming of text files, set the property to "\*.txt" and call the method with a specified for its parameter. Windows 操作系统会通知你组件创建的缓冲区中的文件发生更改。The Windows operating system notifies your component of file changes in a buffer created by the . 如果在短时间内有很多更改，则缓冲区可能溢出。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 这将导致无法继续在目录中，更改跟踪的组件，它将仅向提供全面通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加使用缓冲区的大小属性开销较大，因为它来自无法换出到磁盘，因此尚未保持缓冲区尽可能小的非分页内存大型足以不会丢失任何文件更改事件。Increasing the size of the buffer with the property is expensive, as it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small yet large enough to not miss any file change events. 若要避免缓冲区溢出，使用和属性，以便你可以筛选掉不需要更改通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the and properties so you can filter out unwanted change notifications. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 请注意以下，当使用类。Please note the following when using the class. - 不忽略隐藏的文件。Hidden files are not ignored. - 在某些系统中，报告使用短 8.3 文件名格式的文件更改。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如，对"LongFileName.LongExtension"的更改可能被报告为"LongFil ~。Lon"。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFil~.Lon". - 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). - 你可以为设置的最大大小通过网络监视目录的属性为 64 KB。The maximum size you can set for the property for monitoring a directory over the network is 64 KB. > [!NOTE] > 运行不支持在 Windows 98 上。Running on Windows 98 is not supported. ## 复制和移动文件夹Copying and moving folders 操作系统和对象解释某个剪切和粘贴操作，或者作为文件夹及其内容的重命名操作的移动操作。The operating system and object interpret a cut-and-paste action or a move action as a rename action for a folder and its contents. 如果将剪切并粘贴到所监视的文件夹的文件的文件夹对象报告仅为新的该文件夹，但而非其内容，因为它们仅实质上是重命名。If you cut and paste a folder with files into a folder being watched, the object reports only the folder as new, but not its contents because they are essentially only renamed. 若要得到通知文件夹的内容已移动或复制到受监视的文件夹，请提供和根据下表中的建议的事件处理程序方法。To be notified that the contents of folders have been moved or copied into a watched folder, provide and event handler methods as suggested in the following table. |事件处理程序Event Handler|处理事件Events Handled|执行Performs| |-------------------|--------------------|--------------| ||, , , , |报告中文件属性、 创建的文件和已删除的文件的更改。Report changes in file attributes, created files, and deleted files.| |||列出的旧和新路径的重命名的文件和文件夹，如果需要扩展以递归方式。List the old and new paths of renamed files and folders, expanding recursively if needed.| ## 事件和缓冲区大小Events and Buffer Sizes 请注意，几个因素可以影响引发哪些文件系统更改事件，如以下所述：Note that several factors can affect which file system change events are raised, as described by the following: - 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个和某些和可能引发事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . - 可以观看磁盘，只要它们不会切换或删除。The can watch disks as long as they are not switched or removed. 不会引发事件 Cd 和 Dvd，由于不能更改时间戳和属性。The does not raise events for CDs and DVDs, because time stamps and properties cannot change. 远程计算机必须具有以正常组件的安装的所需平台之一。Remote computers must have one of the required platforms installed for the component to function properly. - 如果选择多个对象正在监视的相同的 UNC 路径，在 Service Pack 1 之前的 Windows XP 或 Windows 2000 SP2 或更早版本，则仅之一对象将引发事件。If multiple objects are watching the same UNC path in Windows XP prior to Service Pack 1, or Windows 2000 SP2 or earlier, then only one of the objects will raise an event. 在计算机上运行 Windows XP SP1 和更高版本，Windows 2000 SP3 或更高版本或 Windows Server 2003 中，所有对象将引发相应的事件。On machines running Windows XP SP1 and newer, Windows 2000 SP3 or newer or Windows Server 2003, all objects will raise the appropriate events. 请注意，可能会丢失超出缓冲区大小时发生的事件。Note that a may miss an event when the buffer size is exceeded. 若要避免丢失事件，请遵循以下准则：To avoid missing events, follow these guidelines: - 增加缓冲区大小设置属性。Increase the buffer size by setting the property. - 避免监视具有长文件名的文件，因为分配给填满缓冲区的长文件名。Avoid watching files with long file names, because a long file name contributes to filling up the buffer. 请考虑重命名这些文件使用较短名称。Consider renaming these files using shorter names. - 保持您的事件处理代码尽可能短。Keep your event handling code as short as possible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建监视在运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有 Windows NT 或 Windows 2000 的远程计算机，则无法将其收看。You cannot watch a remote computer that does not have Windows NT or Windows 2000. 从 Windows NT 4.0 的计算机的远程 Windows NT 4.0 计算机，则无法将其收看。You cannot watch a remote Windows NT 4.0 computer from a Windows NT 4.0 computer. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||按位 OR 组合`LastWrite`， `FileName`，和 `DirectoryName`bitwise OR combination of `LastWrite`, `FileName`, and `DirectoryName`| ||`false`| ||"*.\*"（监视所有文件。）"*.\*" (Watch all files.)| ||`false`| ||81928192| ||空字符串 ("")empty string ("")| > [!NOTE] > 该组件将不监视指定的目录，直到设置，和是`true`。The component will not watch the specified directory until the is set, and is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建要监视在运行时指定的目录对象。The following example creates a object to watch the directory specified at run time. 对象监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间，以及创建、 删除或重命名的文本将文件目录中。The object watches for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` times, and for the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果更改文件、 将其创建，或删除，将显示在控制台文件的路径。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file displays to the console. 当文件已重命名时，则向控制台显示的旧和新路径。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths display to the console. 此示例使用和命名空间。This example uses the and namespaces. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Changed As FileSystemEventHandler

Attribute.AttributeName: System.IO.IODescription("Occurs when a file/directory change matches the filter")

summary.span: 当更改指定 中的文件和目录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小发生更改时引发事件时，系统属性，上次写入时间、 上次访问时间或文件或目录的安全权限在所监视的目录中。The event is raised when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个和某些和可能引发事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . 使用来限制在处理此事件时引发的通知数。Use to restrict the number of notifications raised when this event is handled. > [!NOTE] > 时某个文件被重命名，但重命名目录时，则不会引发意外引发事件。The event is raised unexpectedly when a file is renamed, but is not raised when a directory is renamed. 若要监视的重命名，请使用事件。To watch for renaming, use the event. > [!NOTE] > 顺序相对于其他引发事件事件可能会更改时属性不是`null`。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件来监视的文件更改时向控制台显示的文件路径。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is changed. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当在指定 中创建文件和目录时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些常见的事件，例如复制或移动文件或目录，直接与某个事件，并不对应，但这些匹配项便会导致要引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录，会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如，你创建的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果你将文件从"我的文档"复制到"你的文档"， FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory would raise two events. 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"， FileSystemWatcher2 时将引发事件和一个FileSystemWatcher1 时将引发事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个和某些和可能引发事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . > [!NOTE] > 顺序相对于其他引发事件事件可能会更改时属性不是`null`。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. 创建一个文件时，就会立即引发事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果文件正在复制或传输到受监视的目录，将立即引发事件后, 跟一个或多个事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件，以向控制台显示的文件路径，每当创建监视的文件。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is created. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Occurs when a file or directory in the specified is deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些常见的事件，例如复制或移动文件或目录，直接与某个事件，并不对应，但这些匹配项便会导致要引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录，会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如，你创建的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果你将文件从"我的文档"复制到"你的文档"， FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory would raise two events. 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"， FileSystemWatcher2 时将引发事件和一个FileSystemWatcher1 时将引发事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个和某些和可能引发事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by . > [!NOTE] > 顺序相对于其他引发事件事件可能会更改时属性不是`null`。The order in which the event is raised in relation to the other events may change when the property is not `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件，以删除监视的文件时，向控制台显示的文件路径。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is deleted. span.span: Occurs when the instance of is unable to continue monitoring changes or when the internal buffer overflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些内容阻止时将引发此事件从监视更改的对象。This event is raised whenever something prevents the object from monitoring changes. 例如，如果对象正在监视远程目录中的更改，而与该目录的连接已丢失，引发事件。For example, if the object is monitoring changes in a remote directory and the connection to that directory is lost, the event is raised. 系统会通知你的文件发生更改，并将那些更改存储的缓冲区中，在组件创建并传递给 Api。The system notifies you of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer that the component creates and passes to the APIs. 如果在短时间内有很多更改，则缓冲区可能溢出。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 这将导致无法继续在目录中，更改跟踪的组件，它将仅向提供全面通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加缓冲区的大小将占用大量资源，因为它是来自非分页内存无法换出到磁盘，因此保持缓冲区尽可能小。Increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, because it comes from non paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible. 若要避免缓冲区溢出，使用， ，和属性筛选掉不需要的更改通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the , , and properties to filter out unwanted change notifications. > [!NOTE] > 常见的文件系统操作可能会引发多个事件。Common file system operations might raise more than one event. 例如，当文件从一个目录移到另一个、 几个和某些和可能引发事件。For example, when a file is moved from one directory to another, several and some and events might be raised. 移动文件一个复杂的操作的多个简单操作组成，因此会引发多个事件。Moving a file is a complex operation that consists of multiple simple operations, therefore raising multiple events. 同样，某些应用程序 （例如，防病毒软件） 可能会导致检测到的其他文件系统事件。Likewise, some applications (for example, antivirus software) might cause additional file system events that are detected by .

The filter string.

value.span: 默认值为"*。\*"（监视所有文件。）

span.span: The default is "*.\*" (Watches all files.)

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要监视的所有文件中的更改，将设置属性为空字符串 ("")。To watch changes in all files, set the property to an empty string (""). 若要监视的特定文件，到的文件名称的属性。To watch a specific file, set the property to the file name. 例如，若要监视的文件 MyDoc.txt 中的更改，请设置"MyDoc.txt"的属性。For example, to watch for changes in the file MyDoc.txt, set the property to "MyDoc.txt". 你也可以观看某种类型的文件中的更改。You can also watch for changes in a certain type of file. 例如，若要监视的任何文本文件中的更改，请设置属性设置为"\*.txt"。For example, to watch for changes in any text files, set the property to "\*.txt". 使用多个筛选器，如"\*.txt|\*.doc"不支持。Use of multiple filters such as "\*.txt|\*.doc" is not supported. 后可以更改属性对象已开始接收事件。The property can be changed after the object has started receiving events. 有关筛选掉不需要的通知的详细信息，请参阅， ，和属性。For more information about filtering out unwanted notifications, see the , , and properties. 接受通配符匹配的文件，如下面的示例中所示。 accepts wildcards for matching files, as shown in the following examples. |筛选器字符串Filter string|监视以下文件Watches the following files| |-------------------|---------------------------------| |*.\**.\*|所有文件 （默认值）。All files (default). 空字符串 ("") 还监视所有文件。An empty string ("") also watches all files.| |\*.txt\*.txt|具有"txt"扩展名的所有文件。All files with a "txt" extension.| |\*recipe.doc\*recipe.doc|以"配方"扩展名"文档"结尾的所有文件。All files ending in "recipe" with a "doc" extension.| |win\*.xmlwin\*.xml|使用"win"开头的"xml"扩展的所有文件。All files beginning with "win" with an "xml" extension.| |Sales\*200?.xlsSales\*200?.xls|匹配下列文件：Matches the following:

销售年 7 月 2001.xlsSales 日 2002.xlsSales 年 3 月 2004.xlsSales July 2001.xlsSales Aug 2002.xlsSales March 2004.xls

但不匹配：but does not match:

销售年 11 月 1999.xlsSales Nov 1999.xls| |MyReport.DocMyReport.Doc|监视仅 MyReport.docWatches only MyReport.doc| ## Examples 下面的示例创建监视在运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`如果想要监视的文件和通过指定的目录中包含的目录更改通知属性，并且及其子目录。Set to `true` when you want to watch for change notifications for files and directories contained within the directory specified through the property, and its subdirectories. 设置属性`false`，从而降低了的通知发送到内部缓冲区数。Setting the property to `false` helps reduce the number of notifications sent to the internal buffer. 筛选掉不需要通知的详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the and properties. 当`true`，是访问整个子树，而不仅仅是直接子目录递归。When `true`, is recursive through the entire sub tree, not just the immediate child directories. 文件或目录子树内的相对路径返回中属性和属性，取决于正在监视的更改。The relative path to a file or directory within the sub tree returns in the property of and the property of , depending on changes you are watching for. 你可以从的完全限定的路径属性和属性，取决于正在监视的更改。You can get the fully qualified path from the property of and the property of , depending on the changes you are watching for. 如果正在监视的目录的子树中创建一个目录和是`true`，将自动监视该目录。If a directory is created in the sub tree of the directory you are watching, and is `true`, that directory will automatically be watched.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int InternalBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置内部缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size (in bytes) of the internal buffer.

value.span: 内部缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The internal buffer size in bytes.
The default is 8192 (8 KB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置缓冲区，为 4 KB 或更大，但它不能超过 64 KB。You can set the buffer to 4 KB or larger, but it must not exceed 64 KB. 如果你尝试设置属性为少于 4096 个字节，你的值将被丢弃和属性设置为 4096 个字节。If you try to set the property to less than 4096 bytes, your value is discarded and the property is set to 4096 bytes. 为了获得最佳性能，在基于 Intel 的计算机上使用 4 KB 的倍数。For best performance, use a multiple of 4 KB on Intel-based computers. 系统通知文件更改时，组件并将那些更改存储在缓冲区的组件创建，并且传递给 Api。The system notifies the component of file changes, and it stores those changes in a buffer the component creates and passes to the APIs. 每个事件可以使用最多 16 个字节的内存，不包括文件的名称。Each event can use up to 16 bytes of memory, not including the file name. 如果在短时间内有很多更改，则缓冲区可能溢出。If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can overflow. 这将导致无法继续在目录中，更改跟踪的组件，它将仅向提供全面通知。This causes the component to lose track of changes in the directory, and it will only provide blanket notification. 增加缓冲区的大小可以防止丢失文件系统更改事件。Increasing the size of the buffer can prevent missing file system change events. 但是，增加缓冲区大小是占用大量资源的因为它的来源无法换出到磁盘中，因此保持缓冲区尽可能小的非分页内存。However, increasing buffer size is expensive, because it comes from non-paged memory that cannot be swapped out to disk, so keep the buffer as small as possible. 若要避免缓冲区溢出，使用和属性筛选掉不需要的更改通知。To avoid a buffer overflow, use the and properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以组合的成员要监视的一次更改多个类型的枚举。You can combine the members of the enumeration to watch for more than one type of change at a time. 例如，可以监视方面的更改中的文件的大小的更改和`LastWrite`时间。For example, you can watch for changes in size of a file, and for changes in the `LastWrite` time. 这就提高了事件没有文件或文件夹大小更改或中的更改的任何时候`LastWrite`文件或文件夹的时间。This raises an event anytime there is a change in file or folder size, or a change in the `LastWrite` time of the file or folder. 这是一种方式筛选掉不需要的通知。This is one way to filter out unwanted notifications. 筛选掉不需要通知的详细信息，请参阅， ，和属性。For more information on filtering out unwanted notifications, see the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建监视在运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对大小、 系统属性、 上次写入时间、 上次访问时间或安全权限的文件或目录正在监视的目录中进行更改时调用。 is called when changes are made to the size, system attributes, last write time, last access time, or security permissions of a file or directory in the directory being monitored. 使用属性来限制事件的数目时引发处理事件。Use the property to restrict the number of events raised when the event is handled. 创建一个文件时，就会立即引发事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果文件正在复制或传输到受监视的目录，将立即引发事件后, 跟一个或多个事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所监视的目录中创建文件或目录时调用。 is called when a file or directory is created in the directory being monitored. 一些常见的事件，例如复制或移动文件或目录，直接与某个事件，并不对应，但这些匹配项便会导致要引发事件。Some common occurrences, such as copying or moving a file or directory, do not correspond directly to an event, but these occurrences do cause events to be raised. 复制文件或目录时，系统将引发文件被复制到，如果该目录正在受监视的目录中的事件。When you copy a file or directory, the system raises a event in the directory to which the file was copied, if that directory is being watched. 如果正在由另一个实例的监视从中复制的目录，会引发任何事件。If the directory from which you copied was being watched by another instance of , no event would be raised. 例如，你创建的两个实例。For example, you create two instances of . FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果你从"我的文档"复制文件并将其粘贴到"你的文档"，中 FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" and paste it into "Your Documents", a event will be raised in FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events. 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"，将在 FileSystemWatcher2 中引发事件和一个将在 FileSystemWatcher1 中引发事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised in FileSystemWatcher1. 创建一个文件时，就会立即引发事件。The event is raised as soon as a file is created. 如果文件正在复制或传输到受监视的目录，将立即引发事件后, 跟一个或多个事件。If a file is being copied or transferred into a watched directory, the event will be raised immediately, followed by one or more events. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

FileSystemWatcher1 设置为监视"C:\My Documents"和 FileSystemWatcher2 设置为监视"C:\Your 文档"。FileSystemWatcher1 is set to watch "C:\My Documents", and FileSystemWatcher2 is set to watch "C:\Your Documents". 如果你将文件从"我的文档"复制到"你的文档"， FileSystemWatcher2，将引发事件，但对于 FileSystemWatcher1 引发任何事件。If you copy a file from "My Documents" into "Your Documents", a event will be raised by FileSystemWatcher2, but no event is raised for FileSystemWatcher1. 与复制不同，移动文件或目录将引发两个事件。Unlike copying, moving a file or directory raises two events. 从前面的示例中，如果从"我的文档"文件移至"您的文档"， FileSystemWatcher2 时将引发事件和一个FileSystemWatcher1 时将引发事件。From the previous example, if you moved a file from "My Documents" to "Your Documents", a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher2 and a event would be raised by FileSystemWatcher1. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重命名文件或正在监视的目录中目录时调用。 is called when a file or directory within the directory being monitored is renamed. 其自变量包含有关操作的重命名操作，如更改、 旧的和新路径和旧的和新名称的类型的信息。Its argument contains information about the renaming operation, such as the type of change, the old and new path, and the old and new name. 请注意，其属性可以是空如果重命名事件不获取匹配从操作系统的旧和新事件。Note that its property may be null for renamed events if the does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置要监视的目录的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the directory to watch.
The path to monitor.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个目录的完全限定的路径。This is a fully qualified path to a directory. 如果属性是`true`，此目录是系统监视的更改的根目录; 否则它是受监视的唯一目录。If the property is `true`, this directory is the root at which the system watches for changes; otherwise it is the only directory watched. 若要监视的特定文件，属性的完全限定的正确的目录，和到的文件名称的属性。To watch a specific file, set the property to the fully qualified, correct directory, and the property to the file name. 属性支持通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The property supports Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths. > [!NOTE] > 组件可以监视的更改之前，必须设置此属性。This property must be set before the component can watch for changes. 当目录重命名时，自动将自身重新附加到刚刚重命名项。When a directory is renamed, the automatically reattaches itself to the newly renamed item. 例如，如果你设置属性设置为"C:\My Documents"和"C:\Your 文档"到的目录，手动重命名，该组件将继续侦听刚刚重命名目录上的更改通知。For example, if you set the property to "C:\My Documents" and then manually rename the directory to "C:\Your Documents", the component continues listening for change notifications on the newly renamed directory. 但是，当你请求属性，它包含旧路径。However, when you ask for the property, it contains the old path. 这是因为组件确定所监视基于该句柄，而不是目录的名称。This happens because the component determines what directory watches based on the handle, rather than the name of the directory. 重命名并不影响句柄。Renaming does not affect the handle. 因此，如果销毁该组件，以及然后重新创建它而无需更新属性，你的应用程序将失败，因为目录不再存在。So, if you destroy the component, and then recreate it without updating the property, your application will fail because the directory no longer exists. ## Examples 下面的示例创建监视在运行时指定的目录。The following example creates a to watch the directory specified at run time. 该组件设置以监视中的更改`LastWrite`和`LastAccess`时间、 创建、 删除或重命名的目录中的文本文件。The component is set to watch for changes in `LastWrite` and `LastAccess` time, the creation, deletion, or renaming of text files in the directory. 如果文件是更改、 创建，或删除，该文件的路径将打印到控制台。If a file is changed, created, or deleted, the path to the file prints to the console. 当文件已重命名，旧的和新路径打印到控制台。When a file is renamed, the old and new paths print to the console. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Renamed`事件是具有以下签名的委托：The `Renamed` event is an delegate that has the following signature: ```csharp public delegate void Renamed(object sender, RenamedEventArgs e); ``` ```vb Public Delegate Sub RenamedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As RenamedEventArgs) ``` 对象提供了有关重命名操作，例如重命名类型的信息 (属性)，旧的和新名称和旧的和新路径。The object provides information about the renaming operation, such as the type of the rename (the property), the old and new name, and the old and new path. 请注意，属性可以是空如果重命名事件不获取匹配从操作系统的旧和新事件。Note that the property may be null for renamed events if the does not get matching old and new name events from the operating system. 重命名所监视的目录不会引发通知。Renaming the directory you are watching will not raise a notification. 正在监视的目录内部的条目仅会引发通知。Notifications are only raised for entries inside the directory you are watching. ## Examples 下面的示例使用事件监视的文件已重命名时向控制台显示的文件路径。The following example uses the event to display the file path to the console whenever the watched file is renamed. [!code-cpp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NotifyFilters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic NotifyFilters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`null`，方法处理， ， ，和事件称为系统线程池中的线程上。When is `null`, methods handling the , , , and events are called on a thread from the system thread pool. 系统线程池的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on system thread pools, see . 当， ， ，和事件由 visual 的 Windows 窗体组件，如处理，通过系统线程池访问组件可能不起作用，或者可能会导致异常。When the , , , and events are handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a , accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or may result in an exception. 通过设置来避免这到 Windows 窗体组件时，这将导致产生方法，用于处理， ， ，和事件在其创建该组件在同一线程上调用。Avoid this by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods that handle the , , , and events to be called on the same thread on which the component was created. 如果在内部使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows 窗体设计器中，自动设置为包含的控件。If the is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, automatically sets to the control that contains the . 例如，如果你将放置form1 设计器上 (其继承自)属性被设置为 form1 的实例。For example, if you place a on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from ) the property of is set to the instance of Form1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法一直等到无限期第一次更改发生，并返回。This method waits indefinitely until the first change occurs and then returns. 这是与使用相同与`timeout`参数设置为-1。This is the same as using with the `timeout` parameter set to -1. > [!NOTE] > 此方法允许事件处理程序将调用以响应文件更改，即使属性设置为`false`。This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the property is set to `false`. 在某些系统中，报告使用短 8.3 文件名格式的文件更改。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如，对"LongFileName.LongExtension"的更改可能被报告为"LongFi ~。Lon"。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等待，直到发生更改或已超时。值为-1`timeout`参数表示无限期地等待。This method waits until a change occurs or it has timed out. A value of -1 for the `timeout` parameter means wait indefinitely. > [!NOTE] > 此方法允许事件处理程序将调用以响应文件更改，即使属性设置为`false`。This method allows an event handler to be invoked to respond to file changes even if the property is set to `false`. 在某些系统中，报告使用短 8.3 文件名格式的文件更改。In some systems, reports changes to files using the short 8.3 file name format. 例如，对"LongFileName.LongExtension"的更改可能被报告为"LongFi ~。Lon"。For example, a change to "LongFileName.LongExtension" could be reported as "LongFi~.Lon".
